about_the_game:
We are proud to bring you the Original Soundtrack for Disciples Sacred Lands Gold!

The epic style music composed by Sébastien Thifault creates a great play experience.

Contents of the OST include:

26 new audio tracks integrated in game, music and ambient sounds from all menus and stages.

If you loved the game, download this OST now!
